page.title: 12Recreation in Stirling
page.content: Apart from church halls there are the Cowane Centre and the Albert Hall, where concerts, flower shows, antique shows take place. In the winter there are karate classes in the Tolbooth. Stirling has an Amateur Operatic Society and two drama clubs. The cinema has two theatres which each show films every day. In the same building is a Bingo Hall. Two housing areas have community centres where many social gatherings, club meetings and activities take place. There are also several clubs such as the Aquarist club, Art clubs, Writers' Workshop, chess clubs and Conservation club. In Wallace High School they put on plays run entirely by the children and, only when needed, do the adults help. They also have classes for adults, during the winter. In Stirling there is plenty for all ages to do.
